Kettering.Dayton Visual Arts Center:
Dayton Visual Arts Center (DVAC) is a group of artists and art lovers who believe that a vital visuals arts community is essential to the life of the community in Dayton, Ohio. The center offers gallery talks, art exhibitions, professional development workshops and other programs that support contemporary visual art.


== The Gallery ==
After being founded in 1991, DVAC's gallery in downtown Dayton continues to present a full schedule of contemporary art exhibitions each year that are free to the public.
